result.execSummary:
Sedric A Smith was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Sedric A Smith was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.dispoDesc: Picked up by Lake County IN

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sedric A Smith

defendant.name: Smith, Sedric A
defendant.address: 515 W Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188

records.addlTxt: Picked up by Lake County IN
Review hearing on April 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Signed by Commissioner Daniel Rieck on March 30, 2022.

01:58 PM Defendant Sedric A Smith in court, in custody, with State Public Defender Law Intern.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is prepared to waive the extradition today.  Court conducts colloquy with the defendant.  The Court finds the defendant is making a free, knowing and voluntary decision to waive.  Court accepts the waiver of extradition.  Court signs the waiver of extradition and warrant for commitment.  State of Indiana is to be notified ASAP to pick up the defendant.  The Court will not set bail and remands the defendant to the custody of the Waukesha County Sheriff's Department.  Court sets matter for review hearing to ensure the defendant has been picked up by the State of Indiana.  Review hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Warrant for Commitment, signed by Commissioner Daniel Rieck on March 30, 2022.
Adjourned initial appearance on March 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Sedric A Smith
Current: 515 W Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188   (Effective: 03-29-2022)
Prior: c/o Waukesha County Jail 515 W Moreland Blvd, Waukesha, WI 53188

02:02 PM Defendant Sedric A Smith in court, in custody.  Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  
Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.
Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant to be evaluated by the SPD tomorrow morning.
The Court will adjourn the matter. 

BOND:
The Court remands the Defendant into the custody of the Waukesha County Jail.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
